Frédéric Chopin

Two Nocturnes, op. 48

1841 · Chomiński 120–121 · Brown 142

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 13'

  • 1. C minor
  • 2. F-sharp minor

Recommended editions

  • Henle · HN 185 · Nocturnes · ed. Ewald Zimmermann
  • Henle · HN 233 · Nocturnes · ed. Ewald Zimmermann
  • National Edition · 5 (A V) · Nocturnes · ed. Jan Ekier
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50065 · Nocturnes · ed. Jan Ekier

1. C minor

Duration: 6'

Difficulty: 4

2. F-sharp minor

Duration: 7'

Difficulty: 3
